descriptors.name: wisun_node_monitoring
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN Node Monitoring Application
descriptors.description: This node monitoring example project provides a CoAP application to monitor Wi-SUN devices and update them using OTA DFU. It can be expanded to retrieve sensor values and set actuators
